title: No Mana Pots?  Good Idea, Bad Approach
body: I see why they took them out, but why completely out? Why not just make them a refillable item like the refillable potions?  I understand if u have 23456 mana pots and you can push turret nonstop thats op, but if you just have 2 that refill? why not?{{item:2031}}

replies.body: Hmmmm i like the idea. Make it so you cant buy individual mana pots but you can buy just the refillable one. Holds 2 charges, each charge gives 100 mana, refills upon revisiting the shop. I think this is certainly viable
